forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, a gentle mist lingers just before midday, holding a soft, fleeting touch of drizzle in the air, teasing the morning with hints of moisture. The day is expected to carry a partially sunny canvas, only slightly cloaked by persistent clouds, as temperatures hover around the low sixties. A mild west-southwest wind dances quietly through the streets, occasionally stirring up gusts that remind one of the ever-changing nature of this coastal city. As the afternoon approaches, the warmth of the sun may feel fleeting as temperatures dip slightly, echoing the urban rhythm of highs and lows.

As evening descends, the clouds will thicken, cloaking the city in a comfortable embrace, with the temperature settling around the mid-fifties. A layered ensemble would be advisable today—perhaps a light jacket over a comfortable sweater, allowing for the gentle chill that will accompany the coming night. There’s a certain charm in such weather, inviting a stroll through the quirky neighborhoods or a quiet moment with a book at a local café, as the cloud-strewn sky transitions to twilight. Whether seeking a secluded park bench or savoring the bustle of an intimate gathering, today holds a promise of understated beauty in the heart of the city.
